name: Hoguelike: Hogue Versus the Milk King
name_original: Hoguelike: Hogue Versus the Milk King
description:
From the creator of Hogue is Home, Hogue is God, NintenHogues, and Hogue's Bones, it's Hoguelike! A roguelike featuring Dr. Hogue as he battles his way through Milk King destroying the bugs that used to infect his code that have found their way into the real world! Play as our valiant Hoguetagonist for as long as he can hold off the hordes of infestation!

Made during GDJam 2021. Theme was "You only got one".

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Shoot: Space

Soap: Q

Beard Oil: E

Enemies:

Brackets: These little rascals missing are the cause of so much broken code! They'll chase Dr. Hogue and can block any attacks on their pointy side!

Bugs: Spinning little glitchy GDSA logos that try to melee Dr. Hogue. Don't let them get too close!

Ice Cream: All of these glitches have transformed themselves into cold, creamy goodness to fool humans into consuming them! Dr. Hogue knows better, and they know that he knows. They'll shoot at Dr. Hogue, so try to keep them at a distance!
